scripts.version:sync: VERSION=$(jq -r '.version' package.json) ; for d in $(jq -r '.workspaces[]' package.json); do (cd $d; jq ".version = \"$VERSION\"" package.json | sponge package.json); done
scripts.publish:all: VERSION=$(jq -r '.version' package.json) ; for d in $(jq -r '.workspaces[]' package.json); do (cd $d; npm publish --access public); done
scripts.postpublish:all: VERSION=$(jq -r '.version' package.json) ; for d in $(jq -r '.workspaces[]' package.json); do ( npm deprecate "$(jq -r .name $d/package.json)@<${VERSION}" "Rolling release, please update to ${VERSION}"); done
